Yep work for fs2004 ;)

@alex06ze:

AFAIK, the versions for FSX and FS2004 are different, although they come in the same package of altogether 6 DVDs.

goro is right,

The original (retail) package comes with 6 DVDs. 3 are for FSX and 3 for FS2004 (FS9).

The FSX file cannot be used for FS9 and vice versa.

alright guys, don't panic, but I'm gonna give my computer (and myself ;-) some rest for the night..so seeding will stop for the night, but again don't panic, tomorrow seeding will continue until there are enough seeders to keep the ball rolling :)
Please Seed everyone is stuck at 92.0% will upload a Terabyte for this collection.
can anyone explain how to install , i have dvd 2 allready but can't seem to open it with daemon .
Same problem here. DVDs cannot be mounted with DAEMON or PowerISO successfully.
Problem solved: Just move the images to your DVD1 directory, both for CD2 and CD3.
Clarification: It reads it straight from the DVD1 install directory, so just move the 3 images for DVD2 and DVD3 all into your DVD1 directory (the one with Setup.exe).
thanks for explaining !

seed pls&THX

Hi all!

When im done with the intsall, I get this message "Component 'COMDLG32.OCX' or one of its dependencies not correctly registered: a file is missing or invalid."
and if i want to run the Fs2008 terrain cgf tool from the start menu i get the same error message .

Please help me? Thx
Thank you.
Component 'COMDLG32.OCX' or one of its dependencies not correctly registered: a file is missing or invalid
to fix the 'COMDLG32.OCX'  problem, uninstall and switch of all antivirus software and install again
Do a search for COMDLG32.ocx, download to your system32 folder and register with "regsvr32 COMDLG32.ocx" in the Windows Run dialogue.  Much faster than a reinstall.
Thanks alot!  :: REQ :: FSX Overland Boeing Pack
